meanings.definition: The state or quality of being high in rank or status.
meanings.sent1: In our school play, the queen's highnesses were portrayed by the most popular students.
meanings.sent2: The royal highnesses attended the grand ball in their finest attire.
meanings.sent3: The highnesses of the mountain were the majestic peaks that touched the sky.
meanings.sent4: The highnesses of the corporate world were the CEOs who made important decisions.
meanings.sent5: The highnesses of the kingdom were respected by all for their noble deeds.

meanings.definition: Used as a title for members of a royal family.
meanings.sent1: The prince and princess were addressed as your highnesses by the royal court.
meanings.sent2: The king and queen's highnesses arrived at the palace for the royal banquet.
meanings.sent3: The highnesses of the land enjoyed a day of leisure in the royal gardens.
meanings.sent4: The highnesses of the realm were honored guests at the diplomatic summit.
meanings.sent5: The highnesses of the castle greeted their subjects with grace and kindness.
